user.title: Set up SMARTi PowerFlow™
user.description: Enter your email and GitHub API token to configure SMARTi PowerFlow™ .

error.invalid_subscription: The provided email does not have an active subscription to SMARTi PowerFlow™. Please visit https://www.smarti.dev/smarti-store/p/smarti-powerflow to activate your subscription. If you already have an active subscription and unable to setup the integration please contact us at support@smarti.dev.
error.invalid_token: The provided GitHub API token is invalid.
